mapper.select: SELECT ceo_idx, ceo_store, ceo_thumbnail_img, ceo_main_menu, ceo_category, ceo_grade FROM ceo_tp WHERE ceo_category = "01" AND ceo_grade = 3 ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 0,20 ;
SELECT ceo_idx, ceo_store, ceo_thumbnail_img, ceo_main_menu, ceo_category, ceo_grade FROM ceo_tp WHERE ceo_category = "02" AND ceo_grade = 3 ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 0,20 ;
SELECT ceo_idx, ceo_store, ceo_thumbnail_img, ceo_main_menu, ceo_category, ceo_grade FROM ceo_tp WHERE ceo_category = "03" AND ceo_grade = 3 ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 0,20 ;

SELECT ceo_idx, ceo_store, ceo_thumbnail_img, ceo_main_menu, ceo_category, ceo_grade FROM ceo_tp WHERE
ceo_category = "04" AND ceo_grade = 3 ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 0,20 ;
SELECT ceo_idx, ceo_thumbnail_img, ceo_store, ceo_score, ceo_follow_cnt, ceo_main_menu, ceo_city_address, ceo_category, ceo_grade FROM ceo_tp WHERE ceo_grade = 3 ORDER BY ceo_score DESC LIMIT 0, 20;

SELECT ceo_idx, ceo_thumbnail_img, ceo_store, ceo_score, ceo_follow_cnt, ceo_main_menu, ceo_city_address, ceo_category, ceo_grade FROM ceo_tp WHERE ceo_grade = 3 ORDER BY ceo_follow_cnt DESC LIMIT 0, 20;

SELECT ceo_idx, ceo_thumbnail_img, ceo_store, ceo_score, ceo_follow_cnt, ceo_main_menu, ceo_city_address, ceo_grade FROM ceo_tp WHERE (ceo_store LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') OR ceo_main_menu LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') OR ceo_city_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') ) AND ceo_grade = 3 ORDER BY ceo_score DESC LIMIT 0, 9;

SELECT A.ceo_idx, A.ceo_thumbnail_img, A.ceo_store, IFNULL(A.ceo_score, '0.0') AS ceo_score, A.ceo_follow_cnt, A.ceo_main_menu, A.ceo_city_address, COUNT(B.ceo_idx) AS review_cnt, A.ceo_grade FROM ceo_tp A JOIN review_tp B ON A.ceo_idx = B.ceo_idx WHERE (A.ceo_store LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') OR A.ceo_main_menu LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') OR A.ceo_city_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') ) AND ceo_grade = 3 GROUP BY A.ceo_idx;

SELECT A.ceo_idx, A.ceo_thumbnail_img, A.ceo_store, IFNULL(A.ceo_score, '0.0') AS ceo_score, A.ceo_follow_cnt, A.ceo_main_menu, A.ceo_city_address, COUNT(B.ceo_idx) AS review_cnt, A.ceo_grade FROM ceo_tp A LEFT OUTER JOIN review_tp B ON A.ceo_idx = B.ceo_idx WHERE (A.ceo_store LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') OR A.ceo_main_menu LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') OR A.ceo_city_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') ) AND ceo_grade = 3 AND review_title IS NULL;

SELECT ceo_idx, ceo_thumbnail_img, ceo_store, ceo_score, ceo_follow_cnt, ceo_main_menu, ceo_city_address, ceo_grade FROM ceo_tp WHERE (ceo_store LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') OR ceo_main_menu LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') OR ceo_city_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') ) AND ceo_grade = 3 ORDER BY ceo_follow_cnt DESC LIMIT 0, 9;

SELECT A.ceo_idx, A.ceo_store, A.customer_id, A.customer_follow, B.ceo_idx, B.ceo_store, B.ceo_thumbnail_img, B.ceo_main_menu, B.ceo_score, B.ceo_follow_cnt, B.ceo_grade, B.ceo_category, B.ceo_city_address, C.customer_gender, C.customer_age FROM filter_tp A JOIN ceo_tp B ON A.ceo_idx = B.ceo_idx JOIN customer_tp C ON A.customer_id = C.customer_id WHERE 1=1 AND (B.ceo_store LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') OR B.ceo_main_menu LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') OR B.ceo_city_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') ) AND B.ceo_grade = 3 AND C.customer_age = #{customAge} ;

SELECT A.ceo_idx, A.ceo_store, A.customer_id, A.customer_follow, B.ceo_idx, B.ceo_store, B.ceo_thumbnail_img, B.ceo_main_menu, B.ceo_score, B.ceo_follow_cnt, B.ceo_grade, B.ceo_category, B.ceo_city_address, C.customer_gender, C.customer_age FROM filter_tp A JOIN ceo_tp B ON A.ceo_idx = B.ceo_idx JOIN customer_tp C ON A.customer_id = C.customer_id
WHERE 1=1 AND (B.ceo_store LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') OR B.ceo_main_menu LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') OR B.ceo_city_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') ) AND B.ceo_grade = 3 AND C.customer_gender = #{genderKey};

SELECT A.ceo_idx, A.ceo_store, A.customer_id, A.customer_follow, B.ceo_idx, B.ceo_store, B.ceo_thumbnail_img, B.ceo_main_menu, B.ceo_score, B.ceo_follow_cnt, B.ceo_grade, B.ceo_category, B.ceo_city_address, C.customer_gender, C.customer_age,( CASE WHEN #{categoryFoods} = 01 THEN '한식' WHEN #{categoryFoods} = 02 THEN '일식' WHEN #{categoryFoods} = 03 THEN '중식' WHEN #{categoryFoods} = 04 THEN '양식' END ) AS food FROM filter_tp A JOIN ceo_tp B ON A.ceo_idx = B.ceo_idx JOIN customer_tp C ON A.customer_id = C.customer_id
WHERE 1=1 AND B.ceo_category = #{categoryFoods} AND (B.ceo_store LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') OR B.ceo_main_menu LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') OR B.ceo_city_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWorld},'%') ) AND B.ceo_grade = 3;
